changelog-entry.author: Rodolfo Hansen <rhansen@kitsd.com>
changelog-entry.msg: Avoid IF nesting, keeping the backwards compaitibility of the origina patch (2acb32ec7b8fa8) and still allows people to cleanly override the -noverify behavior

changelog-entry.author: Rodolfo Hansen <rhansen@kitsd.com>
changelog-entry.msg:
Revert "Problem: GAE 1.7.5 doesn't run with certain javaAgents"
This reverts commit 2acb32ec7b8fa8ff2a7239ac55a24fe37f19dc18.

changelog-entry.author: Nathan Toone <nathan@toonetown.com>
changelog-entry.msg:
Problem: GAE 1.7.5 doesn't run with certain javaAgents
As described at https://code.google.com/p/appengine-maven-plugin/issues/detail?id=10, there can be problems with adding the "noverify" flag when also specifying a javaAgent to the server. Instead, we provide an option which will allow you to *not* add this flag, if it's causing problems.

changelog-entry.author: Nathan Toone <nathan@toonetown.com>
changelog-entry.msg:
Problem: gae:start not forking
Since the string that is printed out by the local appengine server has changed, we need to watch for it instead. We change the string to "is running" to be a bit more robust in the future as well.
